CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN!
WAKANDA HULKBUSTER IS THAT?
Black Panther brings out the heavy artillery to take on Amadeus Cho, the Totally Awesome Hulk!
When diplomacy fails two of the smartest guys on the planet, fists will just have to do!
